You don’t have to think smoking pot is good for you to see that outlawing it does more harm than good

author.bio_html: Rookie indie dev. Left for greener pastures when ruqqus stopped being a free speech site, you can find me at https://www.minds.com/freecomet/ or https://discussions.app/u/FreeComet. Shameless plug for my rumble channel: https://rumble.com/c/FreeComet

body: I'm mostly pretty apathetic about it. I don't have a particular reason for it to be banned, so it's probably reasonable to legalize it, especially on a state level when they voted for it. However I have noticed in some states they tried to legalize it with a monopoly that can dispense it. That just seems pointless. Sorta reminds me of people illegally selling cigarettes to evade the taxes on them.
body_html: I'm mostly pretty apathetic about it. I don't have a particular reason for it to be banned, so it's probably reasonable to legalize it, especially on a state level when they voted for it. However I have noticed in some states they tried to legalize it with a monopoly that can dispense it. That just seems pointless. Sorta reminds me of people illegally selling cigarettes to evade the taxes on them.

body:
Decriminalize and legalize it. Prohibition of Cannibis doesn't decrease demand by a whole lot, and only increases profits for dealers. 

People would start seeing the negative effects of Cannibis after a few years, and it's usage would go down the same as the usage of cigarettes is going down in younger generations. 

To see that prohibition of substances doesn't really work, just look at the alcohol prohibition.
body_html:
Decriminalize and legalize it. Prohibition of Cannibis doesn't decrease demand by a whole lot, and only increases profits for dealers.

People would start seeing the negative effects of Cannibis after a few years, and it's usage would go down the same as the usage of cigarettes is going down in younger generations.

To see that prohibition of substances doesn't really work, just look at the alcohol prohibition.

author.bio: Former Hells Angel, ex-carny, briefly a merc, and now retired....but still raising enough hell to get booted from Reddit, and banned from Facebook without ever joining.
author.bio_html: Former Hells Angel, ex-carny, briefly a merc, and now retired....but still raising enough hell to get booted from Reddit, and banned from Facebook without ever joining.

body: For legalization of all drugs, especially cannabis. If fools can drink themselves to death, smoke themselves to death, kill themselves with pharmaceuticals like Fen-phen, etc., then the whole argument for drug laws becomes nonsensical. Victimless crimes does nothing but create criminals where none existed, overcrowd the prisons (which in turn gets violent criminals unleashed), and increases the tax burden. Only idiots worry more about what someone does to himself, than what he does to others. Let the lōtophagoi waste their lives as they see fit.

guild.description:
Ask and answer questions.

Rules:

🤔 Posts must be questions. This is a community dedicated to Q&A discussion, so post titles must be in the form of a question.

⁉️ No loaded questions.

📬 No spamming. Spamming comments or posts is not allowed.

😀 Be civil. Be nice. Harassment, trolling, and disruptive behavior is not allowed. Basically, don’t be a jerk.

🥾 Breaking these rules will result in posts being kicked and possibly an exile.

📜 Follow Ruqqus ToS. This is a given.
